Description: FMCG EXPERIENCE IS A MUST.Our client is a dynamic and rapidly growing eCommerce company dedicated to delivering exceptional B2B solutions and are developing a new cutting-edge Global Marketplace. They pride ourselves on innovation, customer-centric design, and a passion for staying at the forefront of eCommerce trends. We are seeking a highly skilled and creative Graphic Designer with expertise in UI/UX to join their team in Dubai and help shape the future of eCommerce.We are looking for a talented Graphic Designer with a strong background in UI/UX design to play a pivotal role in elevating their B2B eCommerce platform. As a Graphic Designer you will have the opportunity to work on cutting-edge projects, collaborate with a diverse team, and contribute to the development of user-centric designs that drive business growth.**Key Responsibilities:**1. **UI/UX Design:** Create visually appealing and intuitive user interfaces for the B2B eCommerce platform, ensuring a seamless and engaging user experience.2. **Graphic Design:** Produce high-quality graphics, including banners, marketing materials, and product visuals that align with our brand identity and resonate with our target audience.3. **Collaboration:** Work closely with cross-functional teams, including developers, product managers, and marketers, to gather requirements and iterate on design concepts.4. **Research:** Stay up-to-date with industry trends and best practices in eCommerce, graphic design, and UI/UX to continuously improve our designs and user experience.5. **Brand Consistency:** Maintain brand consistency across all design assets and ensure they align with our B2B image and messaging.Skills
Skills: - Proven experience in graphic design with a strong portfolio showcasing UI/UX design expertise.
- Proficiency in design tools such as Adobe (CS) Creative Suite, Sketch, Figma, or similar.
- Solid understanding of B2B eCommerce trends and user behaviour. And FMCG experience is mandatory.
- Strong communication skills and ability to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams.
- Ability to work in a fast-paced environment and meet deadlines.
- Bachelor's degree in Graphic Design, UI/UX Design, or a related field.
- Experience with responsive design and mobile app design.
- Knowledge of HTML, CSS, and web development principles.
- Experience in eCommerce or FMCG industry.
